text: Intersection is a 1994 drama movie. The movie is about an architect who has flashbacks when his Mercedes crashes. Lolita Davidovich plays Olivia Marshak. Sharon Stone plays Sally Eastman. Jennifer Morrison also stars in the movie. The reviews of the movie were negative. It did poorly in the box office. ==References== Category:1994 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Rydell Category:Movies composed by James Newton Howard
title: Intersection (movie)
